content: i designed this summery square for this years granny square month cal and was delighted to have a design chosen for the second year running please see the hobbycraft website to see all the gorgeous squares for this years crochet along lots of different techniques to try by lots of talented designers and they re all free to download this cute square begins with a textured strawberry flower surrounded by a circle of strawberries using a variety of stitches the square is then bordered with petals i used 5 colours from the gorgeous knitcraft cotton blend range yellow white teal hot pink and coral stitches included in the pattern front post back loop double_crochet half_double_crochet treble_crochet dtr the pattern includes colour photos of each round along with written instructions in uk terminology to see more examples of this square please check out my instagram page @the_burrow_uk
